siteMetadata.title: Happy Birthday Baby Jesus

author.name: Sir Lord Selector
author.summary: The Finest Christmas Music Playlists Since 2006

siteMetadata.description: Annual Christmas music mixes since 2006. Punk originals and glam power pop. Space-age exotica and steel bands. Gospel legends and garage rock rarities. Private press funk on limited vinyl. Obscure covers of chestnuts alongside holiday originals you've never heard. Each year explores punk, indie, soul, psychedelic, rockabilly, and outsider musicâ€”the weird and wonderful Christmas songs the radio won't play.
siteMetadata.keywords: obscure Christmas music, rare holiday vinyl, garage rock Christmas, private press Christmas, Christmas funk soul, exotica Christmas, lo-fi Christmas, indie Christmas covers, vintage Christmas recordings, psych Christmas, reggae Christmas, gospel Christmas classics, experimental holiday music, outsider Christmas music, collector Christmas vinyl
